resources.string: Please type in your name to get started:
In order to contact us, please use the following email: [coming soon]
We\'re happy to answer all the questions or comments you may have about the app.
To scan a QR Code, click the button below:
HOW TO DISPOSE OF MEDICAL WASTE
The result from the scan will be displayed here

There are some steps you can take to ensure that medical waste is disposed of properly. 1) Obtain a medical waste container from a local provider and place it in your home. 2) If you have any sharp items to dispose of, obtain a separate sharps container". 3) Find a drop-off collection point or a local landfill to dispose of the waste.
